pr_title: Improve test runtime of java-extras & Make Retryable more generic

timeline.message: - Replace EqualsVerifier with by-hand equality tests. Shaves 270ms off of test runtime.
- Remove mocks from FileUtils#ListFiles testing. Speeds up the test by 500ms and improves test robustness (less coupled)
- Remove mock verifications from ExpiringAfterWriteCacheTest, shaves 420ms
- Remove mocks from UrlStreams test, shaves 150ms
- Inline single use OptionalUtils methods, saves 400ms of test time.

- Make Retryable more generic so it can return any kind of object and not just a success flag
- Remove mocks from Retryable test, shaves 380ms
FileUtilsTest - Use any order matcher, ordering not deterministic.

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: Document empty method body
timeline.author: DanVanAtta

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: Fields should be declared at the top of the class, before any method declarations, constructors, initializers or inner classes.
timeline.author: DanVanAtta

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: Fields should be declared at the top of the class, before any method declarations, constructors, initializers or inner classes.
timeline.author: DanVanAtta
